entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Leverage System.Text.Json PipeReader feature in model binding and request parsing #60657
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #60656
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #60655
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #60654
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #60653
  • No wwwroot created on publish of an ASP.NET with React Project #60652
  • Blazor hybrid WPF app on .net 9.0 cannot load static asset #60649
  • Class library projects are added as assembly: ApplicationPart in razor application assembly #60648
  • An ASP.NET core application hangs at startup in AKS #60646
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25125.6] IAuthenticationService.ImplementationType returns Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationServiceImpl instead #60645
  • Event handlers (e.g., @onclick) not working in Blazor .NET 8 layout components #60640

Closed

  • Server URLs in OpenAPI document are incorrect when application used with .NET Aspire #57332
    10.0-preview3
  • Why is HybridCache Still in Preview After .NET 9 Release? #59702
  • Perf regression: json #60625
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #60633
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #60642
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #60643
  • dotnet dev-certs issue with creating folder #59421
  • Improve interaction between enhanced nav and scroll position #51646
    10.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: json #60613
  • Como hackear Instagram de Alguem #60638

PullRequests

Created

  • Only build BuildAfterTargeting pack on win-x64 #60658
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues #60651
    area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2b6b042` to `e5669fd` #60647
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Support resolving OpenAPI server URLs from HttpRequest #60617
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • update project templates use primary constructors #59712
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Readonly setter calls on non-variables #9174

PullRequests

Created

  • Field nullability revisions #9184
  • Extensions: update metadata and open issues #9183

Merged

  • [Proposal] Readonly setter calls on non-variables #9175

Updated

  • Update based on LDM meeting #9180
  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158
  • Revamp proposal for list patterns on enumerables #9165

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasDefaultValue in owned entity boolean property affecting updates #35700
  • Cannot pass a field with an interface type into an EF extension #35699
  • Interceptors - Ignore for a specific table #35698
  • PropertyBuilder<TProperty>.HasDefaultValue<TProperty>(object? value) has stopped working after upgrade to EF Core 9.0.1 #35697
  • Preview/daily build nugets no longer reference the correct EF Core repo SHA1 in the nuspec #35696
    Discussions
  • DotnetToolSettings.xml not found when installing Daily Build CLI #35694

Closed

  • Collation lost when changing type from varchar to text #35695

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Set the environment when executing Scaffold-DBContext #35693
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Navigation test refactoring initial work #35652

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using a Blazor MAUI Hybrid app on a Windows 11 touchscreen device, mouse input stops working after using touch input once. #28092
  • Add performance logging and suggestions to .NET MAUI rendering #28091
    .NET 10 Planning
  • RequestedThemeChanged not invoked after Android 14 theme change #28089
  • No ProcessTerminated on iOS when WebView dies and turns blank #28088
  • Maps control inside ScrollView on Android does not size correctly #28085
  • Keyboard Overlay Issue: Input Fields Hidden Behind Native Keyboard in Hybrid WebView App #28083
  • Android AND IOS Apps crashes in Release Build when activating theTrimMode Switch #28082
  • CollectionView Does Not Scroll When EmptyView Exceeds Screen Size #28080
  • Shell crashes when tapping on flyout menu item after items replaced #28078
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidOperationException: NavigationManager cannot be null here #28075

Closed

  • MAUI very slow on physical android devices #18838
    Backlog
  • CollectionView lagging on start scrolling for Android #8919
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker control Focused and Unfocused events does not trigger whether focusing manually or programmatically. #27957
  • APK cannot install on Android 13 #28067

PullRequests

Created

  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
  • Move to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #28084
    community ✨
  • Fix Visibility Issues #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    community ✨, t/perf
  • [ci] Fix provisioning #28076
    testing-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize formatted labels #28073
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, t/perf
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Housekeeping] Controls sample navigation crash - fix #28069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Resolved Shell TabBar DeviceTests CI failures on macOS #28072
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker focus events #27973
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Implement the option to change system theme on Appium #28025
    area-testing
  • [code style] Prefer file-scope namespaces #28040
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28068
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Revert "[ci] Run provisionator devdiv" #28079

Updated

  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] SwipeView: SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored - fix #27389
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 #27988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Improve the performance of provisioning and running of device tests #28065
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize temporary string usage when DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler is used #77367
  • Workspace update disregards indentation settings in VB #77366
  • Remove and Sort usings is not working #77363
  • Page missing for CS8997 #77360

Closed

  • [Analyzer] - "IDE0017: Object initialization can be simplified" does not trigger on simple using statements #77365
  • Warning is reported for use of Lock class when language version is set to 'latest' #77364

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't report NFW for expected exceptions on shutdown. #77370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • PR Validation - allow insertion to run on commit that isn't latest #77369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.13] Preserve encoding during DocumentState updates #77362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.14] Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flesh out metadata emit and validation around extension marker method #77358
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Implement metadata signature conflict check for extension implementation methods #77338
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Generate-Documentation Check if file is excluded #77359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve encoding during DocumentState updates #77354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Collection expression arguments: evaluate arguments before elements when calling `[CollectionBuilder]` factory method #77344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue for reflection invoke perf improvements #112994
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create Generalized Pattern for Collection Builder Types #112990
  • TensorPrimitives asymmetry between MultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate with trivial inputs #112989
  • Question: do I need to dispose the X509Certificate2 elements in an X509Chain myself? #112987
    Future
  • New hostfxr hosting API design - discussion #112984
    10.0.0
  • MarshalingPInvokeScanner detects structs as non-blittable #112982
  • MarshalingPInvokeScanner doesn't see [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] attributes in any assembly except System.Runtime.dll #112980

Closed

  • Microsoft.CSharp.Tests fail when running against NETFX #26798
  • Question: Why certain nodes in ExpressionVisitor.Visit* method call rewrite rather than update #28641
  • The ReadTimeout of the SerialPort Class is not triggered #111393
  • Stack overflow in PEAssembly::GetResource() #111537
    9.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Consider Equals method(s) on DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler to avoid temporary string allocations #110427
  • [API Proposal]: 'ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue>.AlternateLookup<TAlternateKey>.GetOrAdd' overloads #112974
  • Crash when project lies at network location | Failed to save settings: An error occurred loading a configuration file #112410
  • Improve code coverage for ReadOnlySequence and BuffersExtensions #24881
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core test differences between .NET Framework and .NET Core #30419
  • Provide information about primary keys from ODBC GetSchema() #35442
  • [ODBC] Parameter-less INSERT procedures not available in GetSchema("Procedures") table for MS Access #35444
  • ConnectionStringBuilder returns invalid connection string #39794
  • UriBuilder does not update the port number when scheme changes in Powershell 7 #40680
  • The unsigned right shift operator (`>>>`) of BigInteger behaves strangely #112564
  • `RotateLeft` and `RotateRight` of BigInteger is buggy. #112854
  • Wasm test failure on HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_LargeContentLength #110445
  • System.Text.Json causes duplicate fields for overridden members #112967
  • [API Proposal]: void-returning Encode callback for AsnWriter #112675
    10.0.0
  • [mono]pack nuget packages with -cmakeargs orrcured error on windows. #76717
    10.0.0
  • superpmi: crossgen2 collection "clean phase" replay failures #47540
    10.0.0
  • ILC fails to detect and trim some dependency cycles (interface -> attribute -> [DAM] -> type impl -> new()) #112029
    10.0.0
  • [Analyzer]: Regex.Matches(...).Count to Regex.Count(...) #111240
    10.0.0
  • [Analyzer]: Regex.Match(...).Success to Regex.IsMatch #111238
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add DeriveKeyFromSessionKey API for auth #113003
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix double closing of handle when loading compressed assembly in single-file #113002
    area-Single-File
  • Harden some reflection invoke tests #113000
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Stackwalking support TransitionFrames and FuncEvalFrames #112997
    needs-area-label
  • Remove ValidationContext.MemberType #112996
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • [android] Make native debugging test apps a little easier #112993
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112991
    area-System.Numerics
  • Allow `MakeGenericType`/`MakeArrayType` of arbitrary types #112986
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix c&p error in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112983
    area-Interop-mono
  • [mono] Fix detecting [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112981
    area-Interop-mono
  • [RISC-V] Eliminate unnecessary add instruction in array indirection #112978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Delete unused legacy hosting flags #112975
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix getting resource when ResourceResolve returns assembly with resource that is an assembly ref #112893
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Use osx.13.arm64.open queue for osx testing #112647
    needs-area-label
  • [cDAC] fix condition to only link in native unwinders on Windows x64 #112999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [nativeaot] fix `Exists()` checks #112995
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update GC bridge debugging code #112970
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112530
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.15
  • Remove extra test of comparer #112973
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112878
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement core stackwalking #111759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix the unsigned right shift operator of BigInteger #112879
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: give inlinees their own EH table #112968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents to runtime shared framework #112930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove unused HexConverter from System.Runtime.Numerics #112979
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow loading side-by-side dependent DLLs in the PGO-instrumented build #112977
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement void AsnWriter.Encode #112921
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [infra] Add runtime-extra-platforms to build analysis #112851
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Differentiate `MethodTable`s that are/aren't visible to reflection #112782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Modify buffer overflow logic for System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.ReturnBufferWhenFullFiresDroppedDiagnosticEvent #112849
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution

Updated

  • [android] Make Android app on coreclr use host-runtime contract and provide external assembly probe #112938
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [PERF] all build jobs used for performance testing are now possible to run inividually #112902
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Allow R2R for images provided via external_assembly_probe #112934
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Downgrade MethodTables used in reflection invoke #111610
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize `BigInteger.Multiply` by Toom-Cook multiplication #112876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.15
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.4
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConverter` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Further improve ProbabilisticMap on Avx512 #107798
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for AVX512 #107819
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Zero-diff part of "Use SSA-based ComputeRange" #112853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add approved TensorPrimitives surface area #112933
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • using major version in tfm #112955
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check for an empty string for the TimeZoneDirectory environment variable #112831
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Experimental PR #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Threat model reviews #47170
